languages.text: "Ко мне заявился языкастый ксенос и принялся дерзко насмехаться, а когда я погнался за ним, шмыгнул в портал. Где он?! Я желаю вырвать его печень и вкусить ее!"
"A big-mouthed xenos came to fling his brazen mockeries at me. When I chased after him, he dived into a portal. Where is he? I want to tear out his liver and taste it!"
languages.original_text: "Ко мне заявился языкастый ксенос и принялся дерзко насмехаться, а когда я погнался за ним, шмыгнул в портал. Где он?! Я желаю вырвать его печень и вкусить ее!"

traits.locale_text: "A big-mouthed xenos came to me to fling his brazen mockeries. When I chased after him, he dove into a portal. Where is he? I want to tear out his liver and taste it!"
"A big-mouthed xenos came to me to fling his brazen mockeries. When I chased after him, he dove into a portal. Where is he? I want to tear out his liver and taste it!"
"A big-mouthed xenos came to me to fling his brazen mockeries. When I chased after him, he dove into a portal. Where is he? I want to tear out his liver and taste it!"
"A big-mouthed xenos came to me to fling his brazen mockeries. When I chased after him, he dove into a portal. Where is he? I want to tear out his liver and taste it!"
"A big-mouthed xenos came to fling his brazen mockeries at me. When I chased after him, he dove into a portal. Where is he? I want to tear out his liver and taste it!"
"A big-mouthed xenos came to fling his brazen mockeries at me. When I chased after him, he dove into a portal. Where is he? I want to tear out his liver and taste it!"
"A big-mouthed xenos came to fling his brazen mockeries at me. When I chased after him, he dived into a portal. Where is he? I want to tear out his liver and taste it!"

languages.text: « Un xénos braillard est venu me provoquer. Quand je me suis lancé à sa poursuite, il a plongé dans un portail. Où est-il passé ? Je vais dévorer son foie ! »
languages.original_text: "A big-mouthed xenos came to fling his brazen mockeries at me. When I chased after him, he dived into a portal. Where is he? I want to tear out his liver and taste it!"

traits.locale_text: « Un xénos braillard est venu me provoquer. Quand je me suis lancé à sa poursuite, il a plongé dans un portail. Où est-il passé ? Je vais dévorer son foie ! »

languages.text: “有个长着大嘴的异形朝我走了过来，肆无忌惮地嘲笑我。我追他的时候，他就跳进了传送门。他跑哪去了？我真想把他的心肝挖出来尝尝！”
languages.original_text: "A big-mouthed xenos came to fling his brazen mockeries at me. When I chased after him, he dived into a portal. Where is he? I want to tear out his liver and taste it!"

traits.locale_text: “有个长着大嘴的异形朝我走了过来，肆无忌惮地嘲笑我。我追他的时候，他就跳进了传送门。他跑哪去了？我真想把他的心肝挖出来尝尝！”
“有个长着大嘴的异形朝我走了过来，肆无忌惮地嘲笑我。我追他的时候，他就跳进了传送门。他跑哪去了？我真想把他的心肝挖出来尝尝！”

languages.text: 「ベラベラしゃべる異種族が俺のところにやってきて、図々しくもあざけりやがった。俺が追いかけると、奴は門に飛び込んだんだ。一体にどこに行った？奴の肝臓を引きちぎって食ってやりたいものだ！」
languages.original_text: "A big-mouthed xenos came to fling his brazen mockeries at me. When I chased after him, he dived into a portal. Where is he? I want to tear out his liver and taste it!"

traits.locale_text: 「ベラベラしゃべる異種族が俺のところにやってきて、図々しくもあざけりやがった。俺が追いかけると、奴は門に飛び込んだんだ。一体にどこに行った？奴の肝臓を引きちぎって食ってやりたいものだ！」
「ベラベラしゃべる異種族が俺のところにやってきて、図々しくもあざけりやがった。俺が追いかけると、奴は門に飛び込んだんだ。一体にどこに行ったんだ？奴の肝臓を引きちぎって食ってやりたいぜ！」

languages.text: "Ein großmäuliger Xenos hat es gewagt, mich zu verspotten. Als ich ihm nachjagte, stürzte er sich in ein Portal. Wo ist er? Ich will ihm die Leber herausreißen und sie kosten!"
languages.original_text: "A big-mouthed xenos came to fling his brazen mockeries at me. When I chased after him, he dived into a portal. Where is he? I want to tear out his liver and taste it!"

traits.locale_text: "Ein großmäuliger Xenos verspottete mich frech. Als ich ihm nachjagte, stürzte er sich in ein Portal. Wo ist er? Ich will ihm die Leber herausreißen und sie auskosten!"
"Ein großmäuliger Xenos hat es gewagt, mich zu verspotten. Als ich ihm nachjagte, stürzte er sich in ein Portal. Wo ist er? Ich will ihm die Leber herausreißen und sie kosten!"

languages.text: «Un xenos bocazas vino a importunarme con sus burlas y bravatas. Cuando fui a por él, se lanzó de cabeza a través de un portal. ¿Dónde está? ¡Quiero arrancarle el hígado y probar a qué sabe!».
languages.original_text: "A big-mouthed xenos came to fling his brazen mockeries at me. When I chased after him, he dived into a portal. Where is he? I want to tear out his liver and taste it!"

traits.locale_text: «Un xenos bocazas vino a importunarme con sus burlas y bravatas. Cuando fui a por él, se lanzó de cabeza a través de un portal. ¿Dónde está? ¡Quiero arrancarle el hígado y probar a qué sabe!».

languages.text: "Patavatsız zenonun teki, yürek yemişçesine gelip benimle alay etti. Peşine düştüğümde de bir portala daldı. Nerede o? Ciğerini söküp çiğ çiğ yiyesim var!"
languages.original_text: "A big-mouthed xenos came to fling his brazen mockeries at me. When I chased after him, he dived into a portal. Where is he? I want to tear out his liver and taste it!"

traits.locale_text: "Patavatsız zenonun teki yürek yemişçesine gelip benimle alay etti. Peşine düştüğümde de bir portala daldı. Nerede o? Ciğerini söküp çiğ çiğ yiyesim var!"
